column9: a thugann; a thugas /a dtugann*; a dtugas*

column8: a thabharfaidh; a thabharfas /a dtabharfaidh*; a dtabharfas*

column1: tabhair aird ‎(“pay attention, heed”)  tabhair ar ‎(“give in exchange for; call, name”)  tabhair as ‎(“take, bring, out of”)  tabhair chuig, tabhair chun ‎(“take to; bring to”)
column3: tabhair do ‎(“give to; yield, concede, to”)  tabhair faoi ‎(“attempt, undertake; attack”)  tabhair i ‎(“take, bring, into”)  tabhair isteach ‎(“introduce; retrieve”)
column5: tabhair le ‎(“grasp mentally, infer; turn towards”)  tabhair ó ‎(“bring from; make, attempt”)  tabhair suas ‎(“give up”)

column1: Note: Some of these forms may be hypothetical. Not everypossible mutated form of every word actually occurs.
